required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Tolerability of BMS-986183 in Patients With Liver Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2 Study of BMS-986183 in Subjects With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of BMS-986183 in patients with liver cancer.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events at Its Worst Grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated by comparing the incidence of Adverse Events (AEs) among subjects using their assigned treatment for at least one day.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Serious Adverse Events at Its Worst Grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated by comparing the incidence of Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) among subjects using their assigned treatment for at least one day.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events Leading to Discontinuation
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated by comparing the incidence of Adverse Events leading to discontinuation among subjects using their assigned treatment for at least one day.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Adverse Events Leading to Death
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated by comparing the incidence of Adverse Events leading to death among subjects using their assigned treatment for at least one day.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Laboratory Test Toxicity Grade Shifting From Baseline
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as BOR designation over the study as a whole, recorded between the dates of first dose until the last tumor assessment prior to subsequent therapy. CR or PR determinations included in the BOR assessment must be confirmed by a second scan performed no less than 4 weeks after the criteria for response are first met.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the total number of subjects whose BOR is either a CR or PR divided by the total number of subjects in the population of interest

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the time between the date of first response and the subsequent date of objectively documented disease progression or death, whichever occurs first. For those subjects who remain alive and have not progressed or received subsequent therapy, DoR will be censored on the date of last tumor assessment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the time from the first dose of study drug to the date of the first objective documentation of tumor progression or death due to any cause. Subjects who did not progress nor died will be censored on the date of their last tumor assessment. Subjects who did not have any on-study tumor assessments will be censored on the date of the first dose of study drug.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the proportion of subjects who remain progression free and surviving at 't' weeks (t=12, 24, 36, etc). The proportion will be calculated by the product-limit method (Kaplan-Meier [K-M] estimate) which takes into account censored data

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first does up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by Cmax

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by Tmax.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to T of the Last Quantifiable Concentration [AUC(0-T)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First does up to appromimately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by AUC(0-T)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve in 1 Dosing Interval [AUC(TAU)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by AUC(TAU).

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration at the End of a Dosing Interval (Ctau)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough Observed Concentration, Including Predose Concentrations and Ctau (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by (Ctrough)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by CLT

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution at Steady-state (Vss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by Vss

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution of Terminal Phase (Vz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: (to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by Vz.

secondary_outcome.measure: Accumulation Index; Ratio of Cmax at Steady-state to Cmax After the First Dose (AI_Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by AI_Cmax.

secondary_outcome.measure: Accumulation Index; Ratio of Ctau at Steady-state to Ctau After the First Dose (AI_Ctau)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by AI_Ctau.

secondary_outcome.measure: Accumulation Index; Ratio of AUC(TAU) at Steady-state to AUC(TAU) After the First Dose [AI_AUC(TAU)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by AI_AUC(TAU).

secondary_outcome.measure: Average Concentration Over a Dosing Interval Calculated by Dividing AUC(TAU) at Steady State by Tau (Css,Ave)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by Css,avg.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: to characterize the PK of the total antibody [unconjugated antibody + antibody conjugated to tubulysin or antibody conjugated to any tubulysin metabolites], active ADC [antibody conjugated to tubulysin], and unconjugated tubulysin) of BMS-986183 as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab will be measured by T-HALF.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the effect of dosage regimen and exposure [active ADC and unconjugated tubulysin] of BMS-986183 as monotherapy on the QT interval.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
secondary_outcome.description: The immunogenicity of BMS-986183 (as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab) will be measured by assessment of the presence or absence of specific ADA to BMS-986183. The incidence of positive ADA will be calculated.

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding Bristol-Myers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must have advanced liver cancer that cannot be treated with surgery or other local methods
- Liver cancer is confirmed by a microscopic examination of tissue
- Liver disease is classified as 'A' by a standard method called Child-Pugh score
- Daily living abilities are classified as '0 or 1' by a standard method from the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG)
- Women must use contraception
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior liver transplant
- Increase in blood pressure in some of the veins entering the liver
- Cancer that has spread to the brain or the layers of tissue that cover the brain or spinal cord
- Infection with both hepatitis B and C, both hepatitis D and B, infection with HIV, or other infections
- Disease of the heart or blood vessels around the heart
- Active cancers within the last 2 years
- No more than 2 prior systemic treatments or other investigational agents except PD-1/PD-L1 or Ipilimumab (Part 2)
- Currently on anti-platelet or anti-coagulation therapy
- Radiotherapy within 4 weeks of treatment
- Any major allergies
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply

participant_flow.recruitment_details: There were 10 subjects were treated in this study. All 10 subjects were enrolled in BMS-986183 escalation (Part 1)

outcome.title: Duration of Response (DoR)
outcome.description: Defined as the time between the date of first response and the subsequent date of objectively documented disease progression or death, whichever occurs first. For those subjects who remain alive and have not progressed or received subsequent therapy, DoR will be censored on the date of last tumor assessment

For those subjects who remain alive and have not progressed or received subsequent therapy, DoR will be censored on the date of last tumor assessment
measure.population: The study was terminated and data is not reported for privacy reasons.

outcome.title: Progression Free Survival (PFS)
outcome.description: Defined as the time from the first dose of study drug to the date of the first objective documentation of tumor progression or death due to any cause. Subjects who did not progress nor died will be censored on the date of their last tumor assessment. Subjects who did not have any on-study tumor assessments will be censored on the date of the first dose of study drug.
outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
outcome.population: The study was terminated and data is not reported for privacy reasons.

outcome.title: Changes in QTcF (ΔQTcF) From Baseline
outcome.description: To assess the effect of dosage regimen and exposure [active ADC and unconjugated tubulysin] of BMS-986183 as monotherapy on the QT interval.
outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to approximately 24 months
outcome.population: The study was terminated and data is not reported for privacy reasons.

outcome.title: Incidence of Positive Anti-drug Antibody (ADA)
outcome.description: The immunogenicity of BMS-986183 (as monotherapy and in combination with nivolumab) will be measured by assessment of the presence or absence of specific ADA to BMS-986183. The incidence of positive ADA will be calculated.
outcome.time_frame: First dose up to approximately 24 months
outcome.population: The study was terminated and data is not reported for privacy reasons.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. agreements with investigators vary; constant is our right to embargo communications regarding trial results prior to public release for a period ≤60 days from submittal for review. We will not prohibit investigators from publishing, but will prohibit the disclosure of previously undisclosed confidential information other than study results, and request postponement of single-center publications until after disclosure of the clinical trial's primary publication

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Phase 1/2 Study of BMS-986183 in Subjects with Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
